item.title: [PI]The Magical Realm - Built to make quests easier to make for you!
item.dc:creator: @jummppy jummppy
item.description:
@jummppy wrote:

getters and setters maybe. But none the less good job! Please don’t add things the process either. Make it so when the player logs in it checks the quest tab. And when he updates the quest to int = 1; make it turn yellow or green. There’s already a lot of useless code inside the process method.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]The Magical Realm - Built to make quests easier to make for you!
item.dc:creator: @jew_mad jew mad
item.description:
@jew_mad wrote:

src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:131: error: cannot find symbol sendPlayerChat1G162("Oh. I need a toy from you. If you have a", "spare o ne you could give, could you", "give it to me?"); ^ symbol: method sendPlayerChat1G162(String,String,String) location: class DialogueHandler src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:145: error: cannot find symbol c.getPA().addItem(7633, 1); ^ symbol: method addItem(int,int) location: class PlayerAssistant src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:162: error: method sendNpcChat1 in class DialogueHandler cannot be applied to given types; sendNpcChat1("Ooga, Galooza, Bam!"); ^ required: String,int,String found: String reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:163: error: cannot find symbol c.getPA().startAnimation(441); ^ symbol: method startAnimation(int) location: class PlayerAssistant src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:165: error: cannot find symbol c.getPA().startAnimation(437); ^ symbol: method startAnimation(int) location: class PlayerAssistant src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:166: error: cannot find symbol c.playerRealm += 3; ^ symbol: variable playerRealm location: variable c of type Client src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:174: error: method sendNpcChat1 in class DialogueHandler cannot be applied to given types; sendNpcChat1("Yes it is. Have fun!"); ^ required: String,int,String found: String reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:178: error: method sendNpcChat1 in class DialogueHandler cannot be applied to given types; sendNpcChat1("HELP US! A PYREFIEND IS", "DESTROYING THIS REALM!", c.talk ingNpc, "Scared Guy"); ^ required: String,int,String found: String,String,int,String reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:185: error: method sendNpcChat1 in class DialogueHandler cannot be applied to given types; sendNpcChat1("Thank you so much! Let me transport", "you!", c.talkingNpc , "Guy"); ^ required: String,int,String found: String,String,int,String reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:186: error: cannot find symbol c.getPA().startAnimation(441); ^ symbol: method startAnimation(int) location: class PlayerAssistant src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:188: error: cannot find symbol c.getPA().startAnimation(437); ^ symbol: method startAnimation(int) location: class PlayerAssistant src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:189: error: cannot find symbol c.MagicalRealmEnd(); ^ symbol: method MagicalRealmEnd() location: variable c of type Client Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 12 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Help with these? I fixed a few so far. These are what’s left after adding what was supposed to be in the dialoguehandler class
